channel.title: koichi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in koichi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: (apparently an open) email to koichi
item.description: 06:29 Thursday 23 July 2015 JST Thanks Koichi! I think I’m in the honeymoon of conscious incompetence. I’ve been doing Anki each day as your book suggests, at 5am as your book suggests, and I’ve got between 70 and 100 cards queued up each day. My latest progress is visible at https://www.robnugen.com (if you don’t see any Japanese entries in the top page, it may mean progress has stopped progressing!
